member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware provider which processes subdomain requests and ensures that any routes identified as subdomains are correctly routed

member.name: M:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainMiddlewareExtender.UseSubdomainRouting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering SitemapMiddleware.Plugin

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSetting
member.summary: Loads settings to configure the routes that are subdomains.

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSetting.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether subdomain routing is disabled or not.

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSetting.RedirectedRoute
member.summary: Route that the configuration will be redirected to, this must be a relative route.

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSetting.PermanentRedirect
member.summary: Indicates whether the route is permanently redirected (301) or temporarily directed (302)

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings
member.summary: Settings for all subdomains using the

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.Subdomains
member.summary: Dictionary of subdomain settings for each individual subdomain

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Indicates whether subdomain validation is enabled or not, by default this value is false and must be specifically enabled.

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.DisableRedirectWww
member.summary: If disabled, auto redirect from subdomain for route that has no subdomain does not redirect to www, instead it will redirect to domain without subdomain, i.e. http://pluginmanager.website instead of http://www.pluginmanger.website

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.DomainName
member.summary:
Represents the full domain name of the domain to be used for subdomains, i.e.
pluginmanager.website
This value must include the toplevel domain name but no subdomains including www

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.StaticFileExtensions
member.summary:
Custom semicolon seperated list of static file extensions
Default value is: .less;.ico;.css;.js;.svg;.jpg;.jpeg;.gif;.png;.eot;.map;

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.ProcessStaticFiles
member.summary: Indicates whether the middleware processes static files, .js, .css etc or not

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SubdomainTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing subdomain requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Subdomain.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SubdomainTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by Subdomain.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the Subdomain.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
